PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-02572012-03-05,  ,  TC,  , 
ActCanada Marine Act
SubjectAmendments to increase the Toronto Port Authority Borrowing Limit
PrecisOrder Amending the TORONTO PORT AUTHORITY LETTERS PATENT, in order to increase its borrowing limit and permit the Toronto Port authority to incur obligations to pay the deferred purchase price of property or services specifically for the pedestrian tunnel.
AttachmentsAttachment
